title: Red Mountain
description: The identity of every undercover cop in New York City is in the hands of a murderer.After the chief of NYPD’s Intelligence Division is murdered veteran detective Mickey Reidel is assigned to investigate. Walt Bergman’s body has been found in a house no one knew he owned. During a harrowing night Mickey races to avert a catastrophe. His bosses believe it was a terrorist act but Mickey suspects Walt’s wife, Michellle, a woman with whom he shares a dark secret.
author: David Thayer
